translations: 代表；作为……的典型；具有……的特点

sentences.sentence: These two buildings typify the rich extremes of local architecture.
sentences.translation: 这两座建筑物代表着当地建筑风格的迥异。

sentences.sentence: Everything about this farm stands in stark contrast to the surrounding acres of neatly rowed corn and soybean fields that typify modern agriculture.
sentences.translation: 这个农场的一切都与周围那些具有现代农业典型特点、整齐划一的玉米和大豆地截然不同。

sentences.sentence: This single item will suffice to typify all the rest.
sentences.translation: 即此一端， 可概其余。
